General.Name: 37 Interactive Entertainment Network Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: 37 Interactive Entertainment Network Technology Group Co., Ltd. research, develops, distributes, and operates online games in China. The company offers its products under Sanqi Games, 37 Mobile Games, 37GAMES, and 37 Online Games brand. 37 Interactive Entertainment Network Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Wuhu, China.

1.Name: Mr. Wei  Ye
1.Title: CFO & Sec. to the Board of Directors
